item.title: Abitur
item.description: This is a collection of resources I created while preparing for my Abitur exams in 2022. All information provided here is given without any guarantee! Mathematics (intensive course) Link to heading You can find a script here. Physics (intensive course) Link to heading You can find a script here. German Link to heading To be completed. Files are available in /abitur/german/ Social Sciences Link to heading You can find a script here.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Simon Sure. I study Computer Science at ETH Zurich.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact me at info@simonsure.com or send me a message on LinkedIn. You may also reach me at sisure@student.ethz.ch.

item.title: ETHZ
item.description: This prage provides an overview of study materials, which I create(d) during my studies. I do not take responsibility for correctness or completeness. If you have any questions or remarks, do not hesitate to send me a message. You can find my notes from during each semester up to including the second semester here. You can find more polished summaries and resources listed below for download. 2nd semester Link to heading Parallel Programming Essentials Algorithms and Probability Essentials 1st semester Link to heading Algorithms and Data Structures Essentials Discrete Mathematics Cheat Sheet Linear Algebra cheat Sheet
